objects.query: SELECT Id, Name, ProgramApi__Account__c, ProgramApi__Completion_Date__c, ProgramApi__Contact__c, ProgramApi__Create_Candidate_Term__c, ProgramApi__Create_Maintenance_Term__c, ProgramApi__Custom_Link_URL__c, ProgramApi__Hide_Program_Profile__c, ProgramApi__Name__c, ProgramApi__Program__c, ProgramApi__SalesOrderLineId__c, ProgramApi__Status__c FROM ProgramApi__Program_Profile__c
